Changelog

Stay up-to-date with the latest changes and bug fixes.

Beta 3.4.2 - December 11th, 2018
  • Switched fontstack
  • Updated basic campaign slots to 10
  • Fixed dates on changelog
Beta 3.4.1 - December 10th, 2018
  • Improved premium page
  • Changed up loading screen
  • Removed early adopter benefits due to complications
Beta 3.4.0 - December 9th, 2018
  • Improved tablet performance
  • Fixed small padding issue on console
Beta 3.3.1 - December 8th, 2018
  • Improved /roll command error handling
  • Fixed /generate command bugs
  • Add early adopter benefits
  • Added New /generate feature to help generate random names based off of a race
  • Cleaned up /help command
  • Added new changelog page
